*It's how the world works, children.*

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b763186368720e2c4d0200#post_53b763186368720e2c4d0200
Look boss, have we really thought out the whole killing all the Hu-Man thing? Because honestly its a lot more work than you'd think. These fuckers will go anywhere, eat anything and they fuck constantly. I mean there is like 8,000,000,000 of them.

And frankly they make the best porn, booze and booze porn in the galaxy. I'm not saying we shouldn't conquer their filthy little dirt ball planet, just that we should enslave them instead of killing all of them.
